title: emacs-plus: stats
description: Sharing some analytics insights from Emacs Plus and how they'll influence future maintenance. Looking at installation data, Emacs 28 is currently the most popular version, and features like native-comp and xwidgets are heavily used. I'm considering deprecating some rarely-used options while making it easier to enable simple build flags. For icons, modern-doom3, nobu417-big-sur, and spacemacs lead in popularity. Any major changes will be well-communicated to avoid disrupting users' workflows.
